title: Ahhhh Riot... what have you done xD
body:
I was like: 
_"Yaknow, Ornn is a cool champ, but I have top laners already, and it's not a lane I choose to play often, so theres not really much point in me picking him up."_

But of course, being new and shiny, like most everyone else I've tried him out today.

**No one told me he was basically Marvin the Robot** **but a _Viking_**.....

And now I don't know what to do....

Im a sucker for interesting personalities.
I couldnt give a shit about Kayn despite his awesome playstyle, but give me a chronically depressed viking bear... well..

replies.body:
Riot cut down the h from horn then stuck it on the end of orn lol. Creative champ ... not so creative name

horn > ornh > ornn

Nice
